info.title: Microsoft Insights API
info.description: Azure Monitor client to create/update/delete Scheduled Query Rules

put.description: Creates or updates an log search rule.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The parameters of the rule to create or update.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: Successful request to update an Log Search rule

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: Successful request to get a Log Search rule

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The parameters of the rule to update.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: Successful request to update an Log Search rule

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: Successful request to delete a  Log Search rule

get.description: List the Log Search rules within a subscription group.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: Successful request for a list of alert rules

get.description: List the Log Search rules within a resource group.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: Successful request for a list of alert rules

properties.description: The rule properties of the resource.
The log search rule properties of the resource.

LogSearchRuleResourcePatch.description: The log search rule resource for patch operations.

value.description: The values for the Log Search Rule resources.

LogSearchRuleResourceCollection.description: Represents a collection of Log Search rule resources.

query.description: Log search query. Required for action type - AlertingAction

authorizedResources.description: List of  Resource referred into query

dataSourceId.description: The resource uri over which log search query is to be run.

Schedule.description: Defines how often to run the search and the time interval.

frequencyInMinutes.description: frequency (in minutes) at which rule condition should be evaluated.

timeWindowInMinutes.description: Time window for which data needs to be fetched for query (should be greater than or equal to frequencyInMinutes).

TriggerCondition.description: The condition that results in the Log Search rule.

threshold.description: Result or count threshold based on which rule should be triggered.

metricTrigger.description: Trigger condition for metric query rule

emailSubject.description: Custom subject override for all email ids in Azure action group

customWebhookPayload.description: Custom payload to be sent for all webook URI in Azure action group

thresholdOperator.description: Evaluation operation for Metric -'GreaterThan' or 'LessThan' or 'Equal'.

threshold.description: The threshold of the metric trigger.

metricColumn.description: Evaluation of metric on a particular column

ConditionalOperator.description: Result Condition Evaluation criteria. Supported Values - 'GreaterThan' or 'LessThan' or 'Equal'.

description.description: The description of the Log Search rule.

enabled.description: The flag which indicates whether the Log Search rule is enabled. Value should be true or false

lastUpdatedTime.description: Last time the rule was updated in IS08601 format.

provisioningState.description: Provisioning state of the scheduledquery rule

source.description: Data Source against which rule will Query Data

schedule.description: Schedule (Frequnecy, Time Window) for rule. Required for action type - AlertingAction

action.description: Action needs to be taken on rule execution.

LogSearchRulePatch.description: Log Search Rule Definition for Patching

enabled.description: The flag which indicates whether the Log Search rule is enabled. Value should be true or false

odata.type.description: Specifies the action. Supported values - AlertingAction, LogToMetricAction

AlertingAction.description: Specifiy action need to be taken when rule type is Alert

throttlingInMin.description: time (in minutes) for which Alerts should be throttled or suppressed.

trigger.description: The trigger condition that results in the alert rule being.

Dimension.description: Specifies the criteria for converting log to metric.

Criteria.description: Specifies the criteria for converting log to metric.

dimensions.description: List of Dimensions for creating metric

LogToMetricAction.description: Specifiy action need to be taken when rule type is converting log to metric

ErrorResponse.description: Describes the format of Error response.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

ResourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupNameParameter.description: The name of the resource group.

FilterParameter.name: $filter
FilterParameter.description: The filter to apply on the operation. For more information please see https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/azure/dn931934.aspx
